bug.author: danyang-liu
bug.summary: [BUG] fix bug in DKN smoke test
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
It takes too much time running gpu smoke test for DKN since we running MINDsmall dataset in notebook, so we want to not running MINDsmall when testing. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
add a parameter, when testing, do not run MINDsmall part. <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
